observation:
You remember darkness. And the cold. Cold and darkness. And silence. Those memories are all that you have. That, and a feeling that something you never knew you possessed has been lost.

Suddenly, oblivion is split by a blinding light and a crash of sound. You awaken to the roar of a storm and a deluge of rain and mud.

The Awakening
Copyright (c) 1998 by Dennis Matheson
(For more information type "HELP", for hints type "HINTS")

Release 1 / Serial number 980726 / Inform v6.15 Library 6/7

In the Mud
Rain and muddy water are pouring down on you, making it difficult to see or even breathe. Sodden earth and mud surrounds you on all sides except overhead, where flashes of lightning illuminate a storm tossed sky.
You can't see any such thing.
You can't see any such thing.
You claw helplessly at the mud.
You can't see any such thing.
You claw helplessly at the mud.
You can't see any such thing.

     Walkthru

action: Dig or examine raised patch of ground
Use map and compass to explore and search for treasures
Use map and compass to navigate to the Temple of the Sun to the east and search for the Crystal of L
Use key on hidden door and enter Temple of the Sun
Use lantern to light way and navigate through Caverns of the Volcano to search for the Ruby of Fire
Examine surroundings and navigate through Ruins of the Water Temple to search for the Emerald of Wat
Use Crystal of Light, Ruby of Fire, and Emerald of Water to unlock golden box
Use Crystal of Light, Ruby of Fire, and Emerald of Water on golden box
Solve puzzles and disarm traps to open treasure chest
